translations: 现代的；新发明的；新颖的

sentences.sentence: Archaize building is a neoteric unconscious phenomenon.
sentences.translation: 仿古建筑是近代一种集体无意识的现象。

sentences.sentence: I believe that every child will explore out many neoteric ways.
sentences.translation: 我相信每个孩子都会探索出很多新鲜的方式。

sentences.sentence: Chapter one examines neoteric lyrics from documentary point of view.
sentences.translation: 第一章是近代曲辞的文献学研究。
